modName: S.T.E.P Optimized Skyrim INI Files for ENB
summary: This is a set of Skyrim INI Files optimized with various S.T.E.P recommended features meant to improve game performance. Fully designed with the S.T.E.P Project and Skyrim Revisited in mind.
descriptionHtml:
- This is a set of Skyrim INI Files optimized with various S.T.E.P recommended features meant to improve game performance. Fully designed with the S.T.E.P Project and Skyrim Revisited in mind; or to just use in your own setup. Thank you to the S.T.E.P team for your wonderful guides with a big hat tip to Neovalen.

- View Readme for a list of changes and additions made to the Skyrim.ini and Skyrimprefs.ini files ...


[center][youtube]QxGfcJoqPt8[/youtube][/center]

- Check out my modding series page!
- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75786/

- The file contains two versions for [b]ENB (can be used for non-ENB setups as well)[/b]:

1) Default Optimized

2) Contains Z-Fighting Fix - My personal preference for the solution (May cause VERY slight FPS loss)
-- http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:Z-Fighting (see this site for details)

- NOTE on ugrids ... it is S.T.E.P recommended to NOT increase ugrids beyond the default. So keep it at 5.

- Install is simple, just place the desired INI files in the following location:

- (Skyrim Install Drive)>>>Documents>>>My Games>>>Skyrim (back up your old INI files just encase) ...

- For [i]Mod Organizer [/i]users install to the desired profile ...

- (Mod Organizer Install Location)>>>profiles>>>(Desired Profile)

- Make sure and edit the Skyrimprefs.ini in the areas listed below to ensure proper setup.

-- [b]Skyrimprefs.ini [b](make sure and remove the ; before each of these lines as well to activate it)[/b]
[/b]
[b]iSize H=X
iSize W=X

[/b]- X equals your desired screen resolution H being height and W being width. Example being for 1920x1080, H would be 1080 and W would be 1920.

[b]sD3DDevice=X

[/b]- X equals the name of your video card, simply copy from your older Skyrimprefs.ini file and paste. IE: "NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti"


- [b]Enjoy![/b]
author: Taylem

files.name: STEP Optimized for ENB Skyrim INI Set
